p: The mosquito repellent formulation derived from local herbs has been value added with natural fragrance for using as mosquito-cum-room freshener (Aeromos). It has an extra advantage over conventional mosquito repellents available in the market due to additional natural fragrance. It can be used as mosquito repellent as well as a deodorant by spraying in the living rooms. It is primarily a formulation of essential oils of local herbs and is effective for 3–4 h, non-toxic and eco-friendly, and the natural fragrance is acceptable to all age groups.
